aka: The Odyssey of a Treasure - Stolen Music: The Secret Treasure of the Nazis
宝藏的旅程：纳粹的秘密宝藏 偷来的音乐
this_title: L'Odyssée d'un trésor - La musique spoliée : Le trésor secret des nazis
trans_title: 宝藏的旅程：纳粹的秘密宝藏
The Odyssey of a Treasure - Stolen Music: The Secret Treasure of the Nazis
宝藏的旅程：纳粹的秘密宝藏 偷来的音乐
introduction: In 1940, in St-Leu-la-Forêt near Paris, the famous international harpsichordist Wanda Landoswska was completely robbed of her possessions by a Nazi commando instructed to steal priceless musical scores and instruments from Europe. One of the boxes contained the piano on which Chopin reportedly composed his famous Preludes. What happened to this piano and all the treasures stolen from all over Europe between 1940 and 1944?Producer: AB ProductionsDirector: Isabelle Gendre
chinese_title: 宝藏的旅程：纳粹的秘密宝藏
foreign_title: L'Odyssée d'un trésor - La musique spoliée : Le trésor secret des nazis
